sn1.31:4.2: At one time the Buddha was staying near Sāvatthī, in Jeta’s Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s monastery.
sn1.31:4.3: Then, late at night, several beautiful gods of the Satullapa Group, lighting up the entire Jeta’s Grove, went up to the Buddha,
sn1.31:4.5: and recited this verse in the Buddha’s presence:
sn1.31:5.1: “You should only associate with the virtuous,
sn1.31:5.2: you should try to get close to the virtuous.
